    • Content

      *! version 1.0.0  30jun2009
program u_mi_impute_replace_expr, sclass
	version 11
	args varlist

	if ("`varlist'"=="") {
		local varlist `r(expnames)'
	}
	if ("`varlist'"=="") {
		di as txt ///
			"no expressions found in {cmd:r(expnames)}; do nothing"
		exit
	}
	tokenize `varlist'
	local i = 1
	while("``i''"!="") {
		local var ``i''
		local expr : variable label `var'
		qui replace `var' = `expr'
		local ++i
	}
end

      • Tokens

        ado   expr   expr ado   impute   impute replace   mi impute   replace   replace expr
